name: parting-shot
flavor_text: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.
effect_text_extend: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
effect_text_simple: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
